songs.title: Petty*
songs.lyrics:
Full lyrics will be available upon release. Stay tuned!

*Snippet*
[Verse]
N*ggas suck and fuck but still
He gone cheat on you anyways
Gave you what you wanted
But I still feel like you never cared
Always had your back
But when I need you, you was never there
Damn...
Needed someone to believe in
So I took a look in the mirror
And became what I was looking for
